q.quote: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
q.author: Marcus Garvey

q.quote: When your values are clear to you, making decisions becomes easier.
q.author: Roy E. Disney

q.quote: Nothing can bring a real sense of security into the home except true love.
q.author: Billy Graham

q.quote: No act of kindness, no matter how small, is ever wasted.
q.author: Aesop

q.quote: It's not that I'm so smart, it's just that I stay with problems longer.
q.author: Albert Einstein

q.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
q.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

q.quote: The only thing better than singing is more singing.
q.author: Ella Fitzgerald

q.quote: Self-belief and hard work will always earn you success.
q.author: Virat Kohli

q.quote: One's art goes as far and as deep as one's love goes.
q.author: Andrew Wyeth

q.quote: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what's right.
q.author: Brigham Young

q.quote: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
q.author: Bob Marley

q.quote: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
q.author: Dale Carnegie

q.quote: The good times of today, are the sad thoughts of tomorrow.
q.author: Bob Marley

q.quote: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
q.author: Anton Chekhov
